languages.text: {n}Таких огромных муравейников Вольный Торговец еще не видел. Но самое жуткое — это скелет ксеноса, привязанный к нему путами из незнакомого материала. Лишь по друкарскому оружию, торчащему меж ребер, можно понять, кто именно перед вами. Поедание муравьями — страшная пытка, и клинок в спине кажется жестом нетипичного для этой расы милосердия.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Таких огромных муравейников Вольный Торговец еще не видел. Но самое жуткое — это скелет ксеноса, привязанный к нему путами из незнакомого материала. Лишь по друкарскому оружию, торчащему меж ребер, можно понять, кто именно перед вами. Поедание муравьями — страшная пытка, и клинок в спине кажется жестом нетипичного для этой расы милосердия.{/n}

languages.text: {n}The Rogue Trader has never seen an anthill of such size before. But the most disturbing thing about it is a xenos skeleton tied to the anthill with bonds made from some unknown material. The Drukhari weapon stuck in the corpse is the only detail that can point to the perpetrator. Being eaten by ants is a horrific torture that makes the blade in the back seem like an act of mercy — a most uncharacteristic gesture for this race.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Таких огромных муравейников Вольный Торговец еще не видел. Но самое жуткое — это скелет ксеноса, привязанный к нему путами из незнакомого материала. Лишь по друкарскому оружию, торчащему меж ребер, можно понять, кто именно перед вами. Поедание муравьями — страшная пытка, и клинок в спине кажется жестом нетипичного для этой расы милосердия.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The Rogue Trader had never seen such a big anthill before. But the creepiest thing about it was a skeleton of a xenos tied up to the anthill with whip coils made from some unknown material. The Drukhari weapon stuck in the corpse is the only detail that can point to the perpetrator. Being eaten by ants is a horrific torture that makes the backstab seem like an act of mercy — quite an uncharacteristic gesture for this race.{/n}

The Drukhari weapon stuck in the corpse is the only detail that can point to the perpetrator. Being eaten by ants is a horrific torture that makes the backstab seem like an act of mercy — quite an uncharacteristic gesture for this race.{/n}

Being eaten by ants is a horrific torture that makes the backstab seem like an act of mercy — quite an uncharacteristic gesture for this race.{/n}

Being eaten by ants is a horrific torture that makes the backstab seem like an act of mercy — quite an uncharacteristic gesture for this race.{/n}

The Drukhari weapon stuck in the corpse is the only detail that can point to the perpetrator. {n}The Rogue Trader has never seen an anthill of such size before. But the most disturbing thing about it is a xenos skeleton tied to the anthill with bonds made from some unknown material. The Drukhari weapon stuck in the corpse is the only detail that can point to the perpetrator. Being eaten by ants is a horrific torture that makes the blade in the back seem like an act of mercy — a most uncharacteristic gesture for this race.{/n}

languages.text: {n}{mf|El|La} Comerciante Independiente no había visto nunca un hormiguero tan descomunal. Pero lo más perturbador de todo es el esqueleto xenos sujeto al hormiguero con ataduras de un material desconocido. El arma drukhari clavada en la víctima es el único indicio de la identidad del responsable. Ser devorado vivo por hormigas es una tortura espantosa; en comparación, la puñalada trapera parece un acto de misericordia, algo inusitado en los miembros de esta especie.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Rogue Trader has never seen an anthill of such size before. But the most disturbing thing about it is a xenos skeleton tied to the anthill with bonds made from some unknown material. The Drukhari weapon stuck in the corpse is the only detail that can point to the perpetrator. Being eaten by ants is a horrific torture that makes the blade in the back seem like an act of mercy — a most uncharacteristic gesture for this race.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}{mf|El|La} Comerciante Independiente no había visto nunca un hormiguero tan grande. Pero lo más espeluznante de todo era el esqueleto xenos sujeto al hormiguero con un látigo enroscado de un material desconocido. El puñal drukhari clavado en la víctima es el único indicio de la identidad del responsable. Ser devorado vivo por hormigas es una tortura espantosa; en comparación, la puñalada parece un acto de misericordia, algo inusitado en los miembros de esta especie.{/n}

languages.text: {n}一座巨大的蚁丘出现在行商浪人面前，行商浪人从未见过这么大的蚁丘。然而，最令人惴惴不安的是，有一具异形的骨架绑在蚁丘上，捆绑它的鞭束是由某种未知材料制成的。唯一与凶手相关的线索，就是插在尸体上的黑暗灵族武器。被蚂蚁吃掉无疑是种可怕的折磨，相比之下，背后的那一刀更像是让受害者获得解脱。对于黑暗灵族来说，这样的行为相当罕见。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Rogue Trader has never seen an anthill of such size before. But the most disturbing thing about it is a xenos skeleton tied to the anthill with bonds made from some unknown material. The Drukhari weapon stuck in the corpse is the only detail that can point to the perpetrator. Being eaten by ants is a horrific torture that makes the blade in the back seem like an act of mercy — a most uncharacteristic gesture for this race.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}一座巨大的蚁丘出现在行商浪人面前，行商浪人从未见过这么大的蚁丘。然而，最令人毛骨悚然的是，有一具异形的骨架绑在蚁丘上，捆绑它的鞭束是由某种未知材料制成的。唯一与凶手相关的线索，就是插在尸体上的黑暗灵族武器。被蚂蚁吃掉无疑是种可怕的折磨，相比之下，背后的那一刀更像是让受害者获得解脱。对于黑暗灵族来说，这样的行为相当罕见。{/n}

languages.text: {n}{mf|Le libre-marchand|La libre-marchande} n'avait jamais vu une fourmilière d'une taille aussi colossale. Le plus inquiétant, cependant, est le squelette de xénos qui y est attaché avec des liens faits d'un matériau inconnu. L'arme drukhari plantée dans le dos du cadavre est le seul détail qui trahit l'auteur du crime. Se faire dévorer par des fourmis est une torture ignoble qui fait passer le coup d'épée comme un acte de clémence, chose inhabituelle chez les membres de cette espèce.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Rogue Trader has never seen an anthill of such size before. But the most disturbing thing about it is a xenos skeleton tied to the anthill with bonds made from some unknown material. The Drukhari weapon stuck in the corpse is the only detail that can point to the perpetrator. Being eaten by ants is a horrific torture that makes the blade in the back seem like an act of mercy — a most uncharacteristic gesture for this race.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}{mf|Le libre-marchand|La libre-marchande} n'avait jamais vu une fourmilière d'une taille aussi colossale. Le plus inquiétant, cependant, est le squelette de xénos qui y est attaché avec des liens faits d'un matériau inconnu. L'arme drukhari plantée dans le dos du cadavre est le seul détail qui trahit l'auteur du crime. Se faire dévorer par des fourmis est une torture ignoble qui fait passer le coup d'épée comme un acte de clémence, chose inhabituelle chez les membres de cette espèce.{/n}

languages.text: {n}自由開拓者は、これほどに大きな蟻塚を見たのは初めてのことだった。しかし、最も不気味だったのは、未知の素材でできたウィップコイルで蟻塚に縛り付けられた異種族の骸骨だった。死体に突き刺さったデュカーリの武器が、犯人を示す唯一の物品だった。蟻に食われるというのは、背後から刺されることが慈悲に思えるほどの恐ろしい拷問だ。この種族にとっては珍しい振る舞いだろう。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Rogue Trader has never seen an anthill of such size before. But the most disturbing thing about it is a xenos skeleton tied to the anthill with bonds made from some unknown material. The Drukhari weapon stuck in the corpse is the only detail that can point to the perpetrator. Being eaten by ants is a horrific torture that makes the blade in the back seem like an act of mercy — a most uncharacteristic gesture for this race.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}ローグトレーダーは、これほどに大きな蟻塚を見たのは初めてのことだった。しかし、最も不気味だったのは、未知の素材でできたウィップコイルで蟻塚に縛り付けられたゼノの骸骨だった。死体に突き刺さったデュカーリの武器が、犯人を示す唯一の物品だった。蟻に食われるというのは、背後から刺されることが慈悲に思えるほどの恐ろしい拷問だ。この種族にとっては珍しい振る舞いだろう。{/n}

languages.text: {n} {mf|Der Freihändler|Die Freihändlerin} hat noch nie einen so großen Ameisenhaufen gesehen. Verstörend ist allerdings vor allem das Skelett eines Xenos, das mit Fesseln aus einem unbekannten Material an den Ameisenhaufen gebunden wurde. Die Drukhari-Waffe, die noch immer in der Leiche steckt, ist das einzige Detail, das auf den Mörder hinweist. Von Ameisen gefressen zu werden, ist eine grauenhafte Folter, gegen die die Klinge im Rücken des Gerippes beinahe wie ein Akt der Gnade wirkt – eine für dieses Volk ausgesprochen untypische Geste.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Rogue Trader has never seen an anthill of such size before. But the most disturbing thing about it is a xenos skeleton tied to the anthill with bonds made from some unknown material. The Drukhari weapon stuck in the corpse is the only detail that can point to the perpetrator. Being eaten by ants is a horrific torture that makes the blade in the back seem like an act of mercy — a most uncharacteristic gesture for this race.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}{mf|Der Freihändler|Die Freihändlerin} hat noch nie einen so großen Ameisenhaufen gesehen. Am gruseligsten aber war das Skelett eines Xenos, das mit Fesselspulen aus einem unbekannten Material an den Ameisenhaufen gebunden war. Die Drukhari-Waffe, die noch immer in der Leiche steckt, ist das einzige Detail, das auf den Mörder hinweist. Von Ameisen gefressen zu werden, ist eine grauenhafte Folter. Die in den Rücken gerammte Klinge wirkt fast wie ein Akt der Gnade — eine sehr untypische Geste für diese Spezies.{/n}
